# install
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tm012/likertSim")

library(likertSim)

# minimal example (first column must be coder_id)
df_real <- data.frame(
  coder_id = paste0("r", 1:50),
  A = sample(1:5, 50, TRUE),
  B = sample(1:5, 50, TRUE),
  C = sample(1:5, 50, TRUE)
)

out <- simulate_and_compare(
  df_real,
  K_min = 1, K_max = 5,
  N_sim = 200,
  noise_factor = 1.2,
  bias = 0.2,
  corr_alpha = 0.3,
  mode = "threshold"
)

head(out$comparison)
out$warnings
